title: Post #1
content: You can't memorize understanding. Memorizing might get you past one interview, but understanding the pattern lets you solve the next ten problems you've never seen before

title: Post #2
content:
Starting is easy. Finishing is everything.
Don't let tiredness steal the real growth that happens in the grind.
Complete what you began.

title: Post #3
content:
Sometimes the most valuable tech lesson of the week has nothing to do with the code.
It's the lesson in patience you learn from a single, stubborn error message.

title: Post #4
content:
Code is a weapon. It can build worlds or break them.
Learning the language is the syntax. 
Learning what to do with it is the responsibility.
